title: 1 (5) of the Social Welfare and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare and Civil Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare and Civil Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (Chapter 2 of Part 4) (Commencement) 
Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (chapter 2 part 4) (commencement) order 2024

title: 1 (5) of the Social Welfare and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024
heading: 2. The 12th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which Chapter 2
text_raw:
2. The 12th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which Chapter 2 
of Part 4 of the Social Welfare and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2024 (No. 6 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Minister for Justice, 

11 March, 2024. 

ANDREW MUNRO, 

A person authorised under section 15 of the Ministers and 
Secretaries Act 1924 to authenticate the seal of the 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [95] 3

title: 1 (5) of the Social Welfare and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 12 March 2024 as the date on which Chapter 2 of Part 4 
of the Social Welfare and Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 
comes into operation. Chapter 2 of Part 4 of the Act amends section 60 
(Temporary Protection) of the International Protection Act 2015. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [95]
